channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump Calls Top Cabinet Member By Wrong Name, While She's Standing Right There
The key pillar of Russia's war chest is cracking. The timing couldn't be worse.
Oregon man accused of killing 3 women and dumping their bodies is indicted on fourth murder charge
item.description: A man accused of killing three women in the Portland, Oregon, area and dumping their bodies has been indicted on a fourth murder charge

item.title: 4 people die in crash of medical transport plane on Navajo Nation in northern Arizona
item.description: A small medical transport plane crashed and caught fire on the Navajo Nation in northern Arizona, killing four people

item.title: Artifacts in US museums explain the outsized role of racism in the nation's history
item.description: Museums across the U.S. have artifacts on display that represent and reflect landmark events of the Civil Rights era

item.title: RFK Jr. pulls $500 million in funding for vaccine development
item.description: The Department of Health and Human Services plans to cancel contracts and pull funding for some vaccines being developed to fight respiratory viruses ...

item.title: Michigan museum preserves Civil Rights artifacts
item.description: An Alabama home where Martin Luther King Jr. and others planned marches in the 1960s calling for Black voting rights has been reconstructed in its ent...

item.title: Robert Thomson, CEO Of Rupert Murdoch’s News Corp, Waggishly Notes That Donald Trump Is Among Authors Hurt By “Blatant Theft” Of AI: “The Art Of The Deal Has Become The Art Of The Steal”
Federal judge rules Trump administration cannot reallocate billions meant for disaster mitigation
